title: Most visited amusement and theme parks in the Asia-Pacific region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Attendance in millions for 20 number of Theme Parks.
The Attendance in millions is highest at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and lowest at Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
There is a difference of 14.81 between the maximum Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and minimum Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Theme Park in the x axis and Attendance in millions in the y axis.
The Attendance in millions is appeared to be the highest at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and lowest at Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Attendance in millions for 20 number of Theme Parks.
The Attendance in millions is highest at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and lowest at Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Attendance in millions for 20 number of Theme Parks.
The maximum Attendance in millions 17.91 is found at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan and the minimum is found at OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China where Theme Park is 3.1.
Theme Park Tokyo Disney Sea Japan has the second highest value for Attendance in millions.
The highest Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan has 14.81 more Attendance in millions than the lowest Theme Park OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China.
Attendance in millions at Theme Park Tokyo Disneyland Japan is 17.91 , second place is Tokyo Disney Sea Japan at 14.65, and thirdly is Universal Studios Japan at 14.3.
The lowest value 3.1 at OCT Happy Valley Chengdu China is almost 2.57 times smaller than the average value 6.96.
Summing up the values of all Theme Parks, we get total 139.11.
